TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartArea extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图表图像上的图表区域。

span.span: Represents a chart area on the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任何给定的图表*内部绘图位置*是一个矩形区域，在 x 和 y 轴行，其中的数据点绘制。Within any given chart, the *inner plot position* is the rectangular area, inside the x and y-axis lines, where the data points are drawn. *绘制位置*是包含内部绘图位置、 刻度线和轴标签的矩形区域。The *plot position* is the rectangular area that encompasses the inner plot position, the tick marks, and the axis labels. *图表区*是包含内部绘图位置、 刻度线、 轴标签和图表上的轴标题的矩形区域。The *chart area* is the rectangular area that encompasses the plot position, the tick marks, the axis labels and the axis titles on the chart. 表示图表区类;对象存储在类。A chart area is represented by a class; objects are stored in the class. 可以在图表区中绘制的图表序列的数量不受限制。The number of chart series that can be plotted in a chart area is unlimited. 一个对象：A object: - 使用一个不同的内部绘图区。Uses one distinct inner plotting area. - 用于绘制一个或多个图表序列。Is used to plot one or more chart series. - 具有主和辅助 x 轴和 y 轴，除了饼图和圆环图图表类型。Has primary and secondary x and y-axes, except for pie and doughnut chart types. 当使用形状图表类型中，其中包括饼图、 圆环图、 漏斗图、 棱锥图极坐标图和雷达图图表时，内部绘图位置定义的图表类型形状的大小。When you use Shape chart types, which includes pie, doughnut, funnel, pyramid, polar, and radar charts, the inner plotting position defines the size of the chart type shape. 例如，增加的值属性在饼图中，将增加扇形的半径。For example, when you increase the value of the property on a pie chart, you will increase the radius of the pie shape. 对于所有其他图表类型，每个图表区有两个集的 X 轴和 y 轴，主要和辅助。For all other chart types, each chart area has two sets of X- and Y-axes, primary and secondary. 若要访问与这些轴相关的属性，请使用， ，和属性。To access properties related to these axes, use the , , and properties. 如果您需要设置一个属性，可影响所有轴在图表上的，请使用属性。If you need to set a property that affects all axes on the chart, use the property. 一个或多个系列与相关联的图表区。One or more series are associated with a chart area. 数据系列有属性，用于确定每个序列所属的图表区。The series has a property that determines the chart area that each series belongs to. 默认情况下，一系列连接到默认图表区。By default, the series is connected to the default chart area. 若要禁用某个系列的显示，请设置为长度为零的字符串的系列的属性。To disable the display of a series, set the property of that series to a zero-length string. 如果另一个图表区添加到图表中，可以将任何序列与新的图表区相关联。If another chart area is added to the chart, you can associate any series with the new chart area. 在所有形状图表类型，以及栏和堆积的条形图类型，必须在单独的图表区域中绘制每个序列。In all Shape chart types, as well as bar and stacked bar chart types, each series must be plotted in a separate chart area. 在所有其他图表类型，可以在同一图表区中组合多个序列。In all other chart types, multiple series can be combined in the same chart area. 三维图表显示在图表区域按图表区域基础上。A 3D chart is displayed on a chart area-by-chart area basis. 可以使用属性来启用和自定义在三维图表。You can use the property to enable and customize your chart in 3D. 最小值和最大的图表区将不会自动重新计算如果您添加新数据，以便在图表不会自动更改轴大小。The chart area minimum and maximum will not be automatically recalculated if you add new data, so the chart will not automatically change axis sizes. 你可以要求使用重新计算这些值的图表区域方法。You can require the chart area to recalculate these values by using the method. 若要垂直对齐多个图表区，设置属性。To align multiple chart areas vertically, set the property. 若要水平对齐多个图表区，必须首先定位图表区使用属性，且然后将设置属性设置为水平。To align multiple chart areas horizontally, you must first position the chart areas using the property, and then set the property to Horizontal. 若要取消显示一系列，请设置为长度为零的字符串的系列的属性。To suppress the display of a series, set the property of that series to a zero-length string.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 强烈建议你使用之一`Add`或`Insert`方法的要在运行时添加图表区的集合属性。It is highly recommended that you use one of the `Add` or `Insert` methods of the collection property to add a chart area at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name for the new object.

summary.span: 用指定的图表区域名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified chart area name.

summary.span: 获取或设置图表区域的对齐方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment orientation of a chart area.
An enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，和属性，它是和 / 或可能对齐或水平、 垂直同步两个或多个图表区。Through the use of the , and properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both. 首先，设置属性设置的名称为对象。First, set the property to the name of a object. 此图表区将然后对齐，基于设置，它定义要使用的对齐方式，和设置，它定义应使用设置的对齐方式的图表区的元素。This chart area will then be aligned, based on the setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment. 如果未设置属性，在图表区不会对齐，无论和设置。If the property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the and settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AreaAlignmentStyles AlignmentStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AreaAlignmentStyles get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AreaAlignmentStyles value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.FlagsEnumUITypeEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 的对齐样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment style of the .

value.span: 一个 枚举值，它可表示单个值或按位“或”组合的多个值，该值定义要使用的对齐方式。

span.span: An enumeration value that can represent either a single value or the bitwise-OR of multiple values that define the alignment to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用水平、 垂直对齐两个或多个图表区属性和 / 或。Use the property to align two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both. 对齐类型是以下值之一或以下值的按位 OR 组合。The alignment type is one of the following values, or a bitwise OR combination of the values below. |成员名称Member Name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |全部All|图表区域使用所有值进行对齐。Chart areas are aligned using all values.| |AxesViewAxesView|使用指定的视图进行对齐图表区。Chart areas are aligned using the view of the specified .| |无None|图表区域不会自动对齐。Chart areas are not automatically aligned.| |位置Position|图表区对齐与指定的图表区。Chart areas are aligned with the of the chart area specified.| |InnerPlotPositionInnerPlotPosition|图表区对齐与指定的图表区。Chart areas are aligned with the of the chart area specified.| 如果未设置值，则属性会产生任何效果。If the value is not set, the property will have no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置此图表区域应与之对齐的 对象的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object to which this chart area should be aligned.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示此图表区域应与之对齐的 对象的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of a object to which this chart area should be aligned.
The default is the empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，和属性，它是和 / 或可能对齐或水平、 垂直同步两个或多个图表区。Through the use of the , and properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both. 首先，设置属性设置的名称为对象。First, set the property to the name of a object. 此图表区将然后对齐，基于设置，它定义要使用的对齐方式，和设置，它定义应使用设置的对齐方式的图表区的元素。This chart area will then be aligned, based on the setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment. 如果未设置属性，在图表区不会对齐，无论和设置。If the property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the and settings.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，该对象用于为图表区域中的所有序列实现三维效果。

span.span: Gets or sets a object, which is used to implement 3D for all series in a chart area.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象为图表区域中绘制的所有序列实现三维效果。

span.span: A object that implements 3D for all series plotted in a chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要启用或禁用图表区三维，设置属性。To enable or disable 3D for a chart area, set the property. 当以三维形式绘制图表时，不支持刻度分隔线在轴上。When the chart is drawn in 3D, scale breaks are not supported on the axis.

span.span: Gets or sets an array that represents all axes for a chart area.

value.span: 对象的数组，该数组表示图表区域使用的所有轴。

span.span: An array of objects that represents all axes used by a chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的主要用途是提供对 X，Y，X2，Y2 轴在设计时属性的访问。The main purpose of this property is to provide access to the properties of the X, Y, X2 and Y2 axes at design time. 在运行时，为图表区轴应使用访问各个轴属性，如， ，依次类推。At run time, the axes for a chart area should be accessed using the individual axis properties, such as , , and so forth. 如果您决定在运行时使用此属性，例如，在事件 — 可以通过指定访问此数组中的某个项作为标识符的枚举成员。If you decide to use this property at run time—for example, in an event—you can access an item in this array by specifying an enumeration member as the identifier.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a object.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 值将是如果您已经指定的背景的渐变颜色，则使用第一种颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 即，如果使用的 alpha 值为 0-没有颜色将分配到的图表区的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the chart area. 因此，在后台将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 获取或设置图表区域的背景渐变方向，还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a chart area, and also determines whether or not a gradient is used.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否图表区将显示渐变，并在使用一个确定的渐变的方向。Use the property to determine whether a chart area will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用的渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 设置图表区域背景中使用的基本色属性。Set the primary color of the chart area background with the property. - 设置与图表区域背景的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color of the chart area background with the property. - 将此项设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的阴影样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a object.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定使用类型的画笔的阴影模式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的线条组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 阴影线条的颜色由属性。The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a , and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位的图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 此外可以指定一个通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像是.NET Framework，包括图标支持的任何有效图形文件。An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，例如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

summary.span: 获取或设置 背景图像的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of a background image.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图表区域中的背景图像的对齐方式和应用时，才属性设置为。This property determines the alignment of the background image for the chart area, and is only applied when the property is set to . 有关可用的对齐方式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a object.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定如何显示该图像; 图像可以平铺，缩放，等等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合图表区的边界内。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart area. 如果图像平铺，则从图表区的左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart area. 有关可用的换行模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，表示绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

member this.BackSecondaryColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of a object.
A value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性是确定的辅助背景色的多个相关属性之一对象，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定图表区域的阴影线条的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the chart area. 若要使用的图表区背景渐变色：To use gradient colors for the background of a chart area: - 设置与基本色属性。Set the primary color with the property. - 设置使用的辅助颜色属性。Set the secondary color with the property. - 设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a object.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set the property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 饼图和圆环图，此属性确定径向和水平线条的颜色在饼图或圆环图之外绘制数据标签-也就是说，如果`LabelStyle`自定义属性设置为"外部"。For pie and doughnut charts, this property determines the color of radial and horizontal lines if data labels are drawn outside the pie or doughnut—that is, if the `LabelStyle` custom property is set to "Outside". 此属性还确定三维图表的标记行，如果`ShowMarkerLines`自定义属性设置为`true`。This property also determines the marker lines for 3D charts if the `ShowMarkerLines` custom property is set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of a object.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定图表区域的边框样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定要用于边框的线条样式。The property determines the line style to use for a border. 在行可以是纯色、 线和等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 对于其他边框样式，请参阅枚举主题。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的边框宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定图表区域的边框宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，属性还可以设置线条的折线图中，自定义图例项显示为线条样式，依此类推的宽度。Note that the property can also set the width of lines for line charts, custom legend items displayed with a line style, and so forth.

span.span: to release both unmanaged and managed resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float32 GetSeriesDepth(class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series) cil managed

span.span: The for which the depth is retrieved.

summary.span: 返回图表区域中 的深度。

span.span: Returns the depth of a in a chart area.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示指定 的深度，以图表区域深度的百分比来度量。

span.span: A value that represents the depth of the specified , which is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以获取一系列指定的深度。Call this method to get the depth of a specified series. 这是相同的度量单位的图表区域深度的百分比中使用返回的值进行测量属性。The returned value is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth, which is the same unit of measurement used in the property. 所有序列都具有的深度，而不考虑其图表类型。All series have a depth, regardless of their chart type. 例如，即使点和气泡图系列有深度，即使整个深度不用于绘制的点或气泡。For example, even point and bubble series have a depth, even though the entire depth is not used to draw the points or bubbles. 一系列的深度可以用于确定自定义绘图例程中使用的点的 Z 值。The depth of a series can be used to determine a Z value for a point that is used in a custom drawing routine. > [!NOTE] > 使用自定义的三维绘图中的任何点必须从相对三维坐标转换为使用相对 2D 坐标方法。Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the method. 若要从轴获取相对 X 和 Y 值，请使用X 和 Y 轴的方法。To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the method for both the X and Y axes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float32 GetSeriesZPosition(class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series) cil managed

param.name: series
param.span: 检索其 Z 位置的 。

span.span: The for which the Z position is retrieved.

summary.span: 返回序列的 Z 位置，它对自定义绘图非常有用。

span.span: Returns the Z position of a series, which is useful for custom drawing.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示指定序列的 Z 位置，以图表区域深度的百分比来度量。

span.span: A value that represents the Z position of the specified series, which is measured as a percentage of the depth of a chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以获取一系列的 Z 位置。Call this method to get the Z position of a series. Z 位置距离到中心的数据序列的图表区背面墙，并以图表区域深度的百分比表示。The Z position is measured from the back wall of the chart area to the center of a data series, and is represented as a percentage of the chart area's depth. 例如，沿 z 轴一半绘制一系列具有 50 的 Z 位置。For example, a series that is drawn halfway along the Z-axis has a Z position of 50. 一系列的 Z 位置通常用于自定义绘图例程。The Z position of a series is normally used for a custom drawing routine. > [!NOTE] > 使用自定义的三维绘图中的任何点必须从相对三维坐标转换为使用相对 2D 坐标方法。Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the method. 若要从轴获取相对 X 和 Y 值，请使用X 和 Y 轴的方法。To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the method for both the X and Y axes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ InnerPlotPosition { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，该对象定义图表区域对象的内部绘图位置。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which defines the inner plot position of a chart area object.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象定义 对象的内部绘图位置。

span.span: An object, which defines the inner plot position of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义用于绘制数据图表区域元素中的矩形; 它不包括刻度、 轴标签，等等。The property defines the rectangle within a chart area element that is used for plotting data; it excludes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth. 与用于此属性 (0，0 到 100100) 坐标对象，而不适用于整个。The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the object, and not to the entire . 属性可用于将多个图表区对齐。The property can be used to align multiple chart areas. 但是，如果一个图表区有刻度线和轴标签，而另一个不使用，不能调整它们的轴线。However, if one chart area has tick marks and axis labels and another one does not, their axis lines cannot be aligned. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此属性还可以用于更改图表，例如饼图或圆环图的大小，而不更改生成的图表图像的大小。This property can also be used to change the size of charts, such as pie or doughnut, without changing the size of the generated chart image. 若要更改的位置对整个对象都使用属性改为。To change the position of an entire object use the property instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定相关图表区域轴的标签大小是否相等。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if the labels of the relevant chart area axes are of equal size.

value.span: 如果 属性设置为 的所有轴都将使用相同字号的显示标签，则为 ；否则，为

span.span: if all axes that have their property set to will display their labels using the same font size; otherwise,

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动计算字体大小控件，使用适合所使用的最大大小。The font size is automatically calculated by the control, with the largest size that fits being used. 此属性适用于所有图表区轴具有其属性设置为`true`。This property applies to all chart area axes that have their property set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示 对象的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称对象必须是唯一的否则将引发异常。The name of a object must be unique, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此属性可以用作索引器，检索时对象从对象。This property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a object from the object. 如果将此属性设置为零长度字符串。If you set this property to a zero-length string. 将引发异常。an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ Position { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 对象，该对象定义 对象在 内的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that defines the position of a object within the .

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象定义某个图表区域对象在图表图像内的位置。

span.span: An object that defines the position of a chart area object within the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的位置对象内，并包含刻度、 轴标签，依此类推。This property defines the position of a object within the , and includes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth. 为此属性 (0，0 到 100100) 使用的坐标与整个图表图像。The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the entire chart image.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RecalculateAxesScale() cil managed

summary.span: 在 事件中对图表进行更改之后，重新计算图表区域的属性。

span.span: Recalculates the properties of the chart area after changes have been made to the chart in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用事件进行更改，有时很有必要重新计算图表区属性，以便能够正确显示图表。If you use the event to make changes, it is sometimes necessary to recalculate chart area properties so that the chart is rendered correctly. 例如，如果更改的轴范围，该轴的标签必须重新计算。For example, if an axis range is changed, the labels for that axis must be recalculated. 调用此方法，在使用后事件以进行任何更改在图表区。Call this method after you use the event to make ANY changes to a chart area.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a object.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现"真实"隐藏效果;请尝试"128,0,0,0"阴影的颜色值。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，设置属性设置为零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a object.

value.span: 表示图表区域阴影偏移量的 （以像素为单位）。

span.span: An that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现阴影效果，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致向下和向右移动的阴影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 负值将导致一个向上和向左移动的阴影。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志设置为`false`，与图表区关联的所有系列、 图例、 标题和批注对象也将被都隐藏。When this flag is set to `false`, all series, legends, titles and annotation objects associated with the chart area will also be hidden.
